    GET_FIRST_PENDING_ENTRY
    "SELECT w.*, b.userId, b.availabilityId FROM Waitlist w JOIN Booking b ON w.bookingId = b.bookingId WHERE b.availabilityId = ? AND b.status = \'PENDING\' ORDER BY w.position ASC LIMIT 1"
